channel.title: ☠ ☮ ☯ Want to join Heroic development team ♛♚♕
channel.description:
[CENTER]What i can do [spoiler][COLOR="#DAA520"]I can code server sided and i am also a web developer i am usually on 21/7.[/COLOR] [/spoiler] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/b233b9c2f61200e7a9e0846e85502420.png[/img]Vps and Domain [spoiler][COLOR="#ADD8E6"]Both already bought and are up.[/COLOR][/spoiler]
Server Information [spoiler][COLOR="#FAEBD7"]Going to run 667/718 no lag will be adding new RS3 items and bosses and much more.[/COLOR][/spoiler]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CAKSa0I.png[/img]Donations [spoiler][COLOR="#F0F8FF"]Once the server is up donations will be split to equal or fair dispute.[/COLOR][/spoiler]
[IMG]http://i307.photobucket.com/albums/nn311/PhotoKillz/m7xeep.gif[/img]The Development Team [spoiler][IMG]http://i307.photobucket.com/albums/nn311/PhotoKillz/m7xeep.gif[/img] Rick as [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/loyalty_/"][COLOR=red]Loyalty_[/COLOR][/URL]
[IMG]http://i307.photobucket.com/albums/nn311/PhotoKillz/m7xeep.gif[/img]Myself as [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/deathstrokepk/"]Calemx[/URL][/spoiler]
Add me on Skype (In my signature) or send me a PM
Simple and yet so sweat[/CENTER]

item.title: ☠ ☮ ☯ Want to join Heroic development team ♛♚♕
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I’m not even sure what you are asking for in terms of a development team.

All you did was post about your server and who’s working on it… You say nothing of open positions or what’s required in order to join.

And how are you going to decide what’s “fair” with donations? Owners standing around and looking pretty shouldn’t get shit of the cut - but of course they get most of it since they’re the owner.

Read full topic
